input.sentences: [male] | [male] and i decided to go ice fishing . we are drilling the hole so we can fish .
[male] is getting everything ready for the next day .
and here 's [male] at 2:00 pm still waiting for the first bite .
[male] got his first bite right before nightfall .
output.sentences: Together, with a little bit of effort they drill through the very ice and down into the watewrs below.
Once they have their hole drilled they thread their bait onto hooks.
All that remains is to set up their camp chair, drop their hooks in the water and wait.
Patience is the key as the sun slowly moves across the sky.
Finally, as the sun sets and the day draws to a close, they pack up their catch in buckets to return to the warmth of home.
